website_summaries.verdict: An adorable and well-painted Pop figure from the classic Batman: The Animated Series.
pros: An accurate 1990s version of Catwoman from Batman: The Animated Series
Includes a clear plastic stand to keep figure upright on display
Detailed paint job with no flaws
Sits at a reasonable price point
cons: Catwoman figure can not stand on her own 2 feet alone

customer_reviews.title: Love Catwoman!
customer_reviews.text: This pop completes my Batman:The Animated Series collection Pop! collection. Love the details . What a collector or just anyone interested in buying this particular Pop! should know is that there is a product defect where the stand it comes with, may not always fit the pegs on the bottom of catwoman's feet, so much so, that one of her legs may break off from you having to stretch out the pose more than the figure will allow. I'm so thankful that this seller replaced the broken catwoman due to this defect at no extra charge to me. They were very nice, understanding, and, decent about it.
customer_reviews.author: Alina Hart

customer_reviews.title: Terrible base.
customer_reviews.text: As a huge fan of the 90s animated series and Catwoman I was happy to have her in my collection. However this has to be the worse base for any pop. I've hand Pop figures that were top heavy that they hall over but at least the stand fits. The pegs are not only to large for feet but spaced where they won't even reach where they need to go. If you keep it in a box it's not a issue but I take them out and display the pops and this stand was definitely a huge production error.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my 'Batman
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to my 'Batman: The Animated Series' set of Funko figures. Note that with many of the females in this set (Ivy and Harley, but not Batgirl), this figure can tip over if out of the box. Otherwise, love it ! This animated version of Catwoman was my favorite in all of the various of her, and was glad that she was included in Series 2 ! After all, you gotta have all three Gotham City Sirens (Harley, Poison Ivy & Catwoman) available in this line.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad Funko finally did a Catwoman from TAS
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, I'm glad Funko finally did a Catwoman from TAS. First Funko in a while without a rushed paint job.
customer_reviews.author: Mister E

customer_reviews.title: I've always loved by BTAS
customer_reviews.text: My first Funko, and she is a charmer. I've always loved by BTAS, and now I have my own Catwoman brightening up my office. The detail in the costume and expressive eyes is just amazing. I'll be adding others soon. Happy to be a Funko convert.
customer_reviews.author: A. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but won't stand up by itself
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, but won't stand up by itself. I ordered several different characters as Christmas gifts and this is the only one that won't stand. Arrived quickly and the box was clean and perfect. Just wish she would stand alone.
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: Purrrrfect condition!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re a collector like me and loves DC.. this is a must! She’s super cute, perfect condition/box.
customer_reviews.author: Damee

customer_reviews.title: Unbalanced
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but needs a stand. Falls over without being propped up. Guess it’s ok if you keep it in the box?
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Volpe

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love Funko Pop
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Funko Pop! stuff. Not too much to say other than item shipped was as described and arrived in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product and totally ripped off
customer_reviews.text: This was the last POP I needed to complete my Batman animated collection, it came in a perfect box but is badly damaged. It also had a NEW LOW PRICE sticker on it showing 8.98 but I paid 40 dollars...maybe the seller shouldn’t have left the sticker on...I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Owen

customer_reviews.title: Love cat woman
customer_reviews.text: Love cat woman, but this funko pop will not stand on her own. Tried 2 different ones and both had issues. sad. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Catwoman
customer_reviews.text: This Catwoman and season of the animated Batman series was hands down the best so to have this pop is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: S.Hody

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very detailed and must have for a fan of the batman animated series
customer_reviews.author: RickWehrstein1989

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I have Batman too. Can't get them all but had to have Batman and Catwoman!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Stoked
customer_reviews.text: So cute! This was my favorite Catwoman of the many so I am stoked about this
customer_reviews.author: Chad Von D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite Funkos, she won't stand on her own but who cares.
customer_reviews.author: JCBlanco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and it fits well with my DC collection.
customer_reviews.author: Winter Drake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter who's away at school. BIG HIT!
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is the Cat's meow...
customer_reviews.text: The third of three damaged figures and Amazon responded quickly. I'm very satisfied with my purchases. Way to go Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Monsterdad2020

customer_reviews.title: This pop is true to the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Great pop true to the show . Reviews are correct she does not stand on her own , but knowing this going in I’ll give 5 stars . Perfect outfit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Another figure that its head is too heavy and will not maintain upright position.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Curtis

customer_reviews.title: She is ADORABLE but I like my Catwomen to stand on their ...
customer_reviews.text: She is ADORABLE but I like my Catwomen to stand on their own two feet. This one sadly does not :(
customer_reviews.author: Kiti

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay up.
customer_reviews.text: Love it.... too bad it cannot stay up. I guess I will have to glue it to something.
customer_reviews.author: D Lo

customer_reviews.title: The legs on this Catwoman are too thin and her ...
customer_reviews.text: The legs on this Catwoman are too thin and her feet are so small it won't stand on its own
customer_reviews.author: Juana J

customer_reviews.title: Falls over
customer_reviews.text: Unlike a lot of other Funko Pop figures, the feet are very small. This makes it nearly impossible to get it to stand up on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Gtgrier

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: She doesn't stand up, you have to keep her in the box. A bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: salron

customer_reviews.title: Love my old time Batman villains
customer_reviews.text: She looks great on my desk at work. I think she looks more like the spandex badass cat woman from 60's TV instead of the chunky one Funko sells for that period. I have Funko Pop Burgess Meredith's Penguin, too.
customer_reviews.author: Gillwill

product_meta.title: Funko Pop! DC Catwoman #194 Animated Series
product_meta.description: From animated Batman, Cat woman, as a stylized pop vinyl from Funko! figure stands 3 3/4 inches and comes in a window display box. Check out the other animated Batman figures from Funko! collect them all!.
feature_bullets: From animated Batman, Cat woman, as a stylized pop vinyl from Funko!
Stylized collectable stands 3 ¾ inches tall, perfect for any animated Batman fan!
Collect and display all animated Batman pop! Vinyl's!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars143 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
